fields.text: Coldplay is a British rock band known for their melodic pop rock sound and anthemic songs
Metallica is an American heavy metal band famous for their aggressive thrash metal style
Diana Krall is a Canadian jazz pianist and singer known for her smooth vocal style
Billie Eilish is an American pop singer known for her whispered vocals and dark pop sound
The Beatles were a legendary rock band from Liverpool who revolutionized popular music
